156489, "content": "#旧曲重听#今天是南京大屠杀死难者国家公祭日。勿忘国耻，铭记历史，奋发图强！#乐正绫#", "ctrl": "", "orig_dy_id": 12864328995810455, "pre_dy_id": 12864328995810455, "timestamp": 0, "reply": 1, "orig_type": 8 }, "origin": "{\"aid\":7506029,\"attribute\":0,\"cid\":12277399,\"copyright\":1,\"ctime\":1497426536,\"desc\":\"❀曲名：金陵劫\\n❀作曲\\\/编曲：yuuhi\\n❀作词：天啟Apocalypsis\\n❀演唱：乐正绫\\n❀调教：墨羽と天堂\\n❀曲绘：夏朵&院院子\\n❀视频：重剑妖精\\n79年前那个不堪回首的日子大概改变了无数人的命运。日寇的铁骑蹂躏着民国的首都，烧杀抢掠无恶不作。30万同胞在这场浩劫中被杀害。而如今，日本政府在面对这个问题的时候仍然态度暧昧，试图篡改甚至否认这段历史。在这一天，希望诸位同胞在为死难者哀悼的同时，能够明白并珍惜拥有强大祖国的幸福感。为这次计划大家都非常的努力！辛苦你们了！（啪啪啪啪）\",\"dimension\":{\"height\":360,\"rotate\":0,\"width\":640},\"duration\":279,\"dynamic\":\"\",\"jump_url\":\"bilibili:\\\/\\\/video\\\/7506029\\\/?page=1&player_preload=null&player_width=640&player_height=360&player_rotate=0\",\"owner\":{\"face\":\"https:\\\/\\\/i1.hdslb.com\\\/bfs\\\/face\\\/e7e8b0bb43dcc0e515b0c2d979bc4b77a925302d.jpg\",\"mid\":2107417,\"name\":\"天啟APOCALYPSIS\"},\"pic\":\"https:\\\/\\\/i1.hdslb.com\\\/bfs\\\/archive\\\/b7cba82a97185863ff79ad650a8eea9ae45235b3.jpg\",\"player_info\":null,\"pubdate\":1481586354,\"rights\":{\"autoplay\":1,\"bp\":0,\"download\":0,\"elec\":0,\"hd5\":0,\"is_cooperation\":0,\"movie\":0,\"no_background\":0,\"no_reprint\":0,\"pay\":0,\"ugc_pay\":0,\"ugc_pay_preview\":0},\"short_link\":\"https:\\\/\\\/b23.tv\\\/BV1Ws411e7Hj\",\"short_link_v2\":\"https:\\\/\\\/b23.tv\\\/BV1Ws411e7Hj\",\"stat\":{\"aid\":7506029,\"coin\":3760,\"danmaku\":733,\"dislike\":0,\"favorite\":3510,\"his_rank\":0,\"like\":1658,\"now_rank\":0,\"reply\":1218,\"share\":646,\"view\":40851},\"state\":0,\"tid\":30,\"title\":\"【原创】【乐正绫】金陵劫【纪念南京大屠杀罹难者79周年】\",\"tname\":\"VOCALOID·UTAU\",\"videos\":1}",
